description:
Hachiman is determine to help bring the prom to life, but Yukino isn’t keen on accepting his help. Luckily Hachiman has a plan — one that uniquely involves the Service Club.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Shimijimi to, Hiratsuka Shizuka wa Itsuka no Mukashi o Natsukashimu.
Shizuka Hiratsuka Deeply Longs for the Days Past.
Shizuka Hiratsuka repense au passé avec nostalgie
هيراتسكا شيزوكا تحن إلى الأيام الخوالي.
しみじみと, 平塚静はいつかの昔を懐かしむ.
